text: Diddy sure wanted to celebrate his 49th birthday to the fullest. On Sunday evening the rapper had a party at his Los Angeles mansion - which was bought in 2014 for $ 40m - where 200 people showed up and made plenty of noise, according to TMZ. But police put a damper on the blowout as they arrived on the scene asking the singer's private security to shut it down or they would. Diddy's team handled the situation.
